title: Textile, 1962–63
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave with warp floats, roller-printed
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (both selvedges present): 376 x 94 cm (12 ft. 4 in. x 37 in.)
Repeat H: 34.5 cm (13 9/16 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Marion K. Morgan and from General Acquisitions Endowment, Sarah Cooper-Hewitt, and Eleanor G. Hewitt Funds
description: Intersecting shapes containing leaves in very bright colors; red, orange, two greens, yellow, and brown.
